kpi.name: M1006C193

kpi_info.title: RB SETUP FAIL FOR HSDPA DUE TO UE NACK
kpi_info.use: The number of failed Radio Bearer setups for HSDPA due to UE responding with a failure message. UPDATED: When the UE responds with RRC: RADIO BEARER SETUP FAILURE or RRC: RADIO BEARER RECONFIGURATION FAILURE.

kpi.kpi_alias: RB SETUP FAIL FOR HSDPA DUE TO UE NACK
